Trip: {props.tripName} {/* {props.tripName} Trip Location: {props.destination} Trip Date: {props.date} Description: {props.description} */} {/* Special Title Treatment With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. */} {/* Special Title Treatment With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. */}
); }; export default MyTrip;
